alert.note: Alert for Portage; Stark; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 3:04PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Portage, Stark and southeastern Summit Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Canton to near Navarre to near Sugarcreek. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations that may be impacted include...Canton, Ravenna, Massillon, Green, Alliance, North Canton, Louisville, Mogadore, Minerva, Hartville, Waynesburg, East Sparta, New Franklin, Brimfield, Randolph, Lakemore, Atwater, East Canton, Meyers Lake and Hills And Dales. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
